name: Healthy Time
description:
Hi You all,

really liked working on this GameJam project.

The limitation of the GameJam: Health is a tool

Turned out pretty well Id say, its not really a full game experience for sure, but the main idea behind it is visible Id say. I actually quite really liked the project and think about implementing some of the aspects to my main project.

Anyway, about this one:

the limitation implementation:

The health is a rare thing these days and in this game it has been moved to a way different level, You have to manage Your health in order not to die. To make it even more difficult and interesting the time is on Your back. It is a tool in a meaning that the World is divided into several parts (poor to rich) in order to keep the World populated with a preset value. 

The World gets overpopulated? No problem, the fed just sets a higher living cost or lower work payments and we are not overpopulated in a while.
